could be a great game if they fixed a few things, but those things are so "essential"to how the game works that they never will. imagine coming home from work. had a long day. gonna spend the rest of the night relaxing and playing games. decided to play killer, only to be zero for four. cant touch the survivors. why? they found a rock or car they can loop around for five minutes. if i catch up? pallet drop. even if i land a hit it doesnt matter because they have self heal, decisive strike, dead hard, and spine chill. on the off chance i do hook a survivor i get called a camper for making sure they stay dead. i am pretty sure the survivors should feel like they are at my mercy and not the other way around. also matchmaking is a joke. facing top rankers even when my killers are barely past level 10.  if its just a bunch of normal people playing the game it is rather fun and challenging on both ends but the people who know the "meta" of the game which involves selecting the most broken skills and tedious strategies along with weapons (how did i last this long without talking about how all four survivors will dance around me blasting flashlights at all sides?) it can ruin a persons night. fixing these problems would mean overhauling a lot of the core mechanics which the creators probably will not do. so it will stay in this state forever. a fun game massacred by its deadly flaws that are advertised as its core "features". do not play this game and expect to have fun unless you come across players that have no idea about the meta or strategic exploits. play this game with no expectations on how to win or lose. been playing for a hundred hours now and i think thats enough time to gauge whether or not this game is any good. its not.

Bought the game after viewing it on Twitch, the concept is fun and enjoyable but the exeuction is horrible.

When you start a game you're either the hunter or hunted, thats all fine but the issue is with matchmaking.
When you start the game your characters are all level 1 and have very limited options for using "perks" i.e self buffs that make you hit harder do more etc etc,

This is all well and fine, but as new player you dont have these until you unlock them via gaining experience, So you can verse players who have a low MMR but are experienced and have full unlocks, So as a newbie you can be versing a player with 500+ hours of play time and full unlocks and the developers expect you to be competitive.

Its really disheartening to enter a game and in reality only have a 5% chance of being able to win kill or live.

Игра не стоит своих денег и времени. Подбор игроков по рангу - это то, что будет вас бесить каждые 2 секунды. Когда ты маньяк 18 ранга тебя кидает к пати игроков, имеющие 1-3 ранги. Если же вы захотите написать в тех.поддержку, то удачи, ведь эти кнопки вовсе не работают или работают крайне редко. Так же огромное количество читеров. Кидайте сколько хотите репортов, но их не забанят никогда. Вот и думайте играть в эту помойку или нет.

This is an absolute masterpiece of a game for the horror genre! 
Now, I know it has it's flaws, but doesn't any game?
Sure it's far from being perfect, but then again, that's what makes it so real and in return, a masterpiece.
There's no other game that can give such a rush to your little heart (with big capacity) from running away from the killer, trying to survive, do the objectives and escape that faith game so much wants yo to face (look at the title, it's not giving survivors any hope xD).
Nor is there a game that lets you be your favorite killer from the classics and watch the terror stay behind while the souls of survivors are taken by the entity.
It's simply put ~ Brilliant.
its really fun.

I own this on PlayStation 4 as well and it is an absolute blast to play with some friends. You cannot go wrong with a jump scare here and there. Totally worth every penny! That is why I purchased it twice.

Acabei pegando o game para jogar com os amigos, mas acabei me interessando bem mais nele ao longo das horas.
A experiência de jogar dos dois lados é muito interessante. 

Muitas vezes vc vai se sentir frustrado e vai querer desistir. Afinal, ainda é um multiplayer e sempre terá um pessoal tóxico. Mas é incrivelmente divertido; como killer vc vai descobrir seu lado assassino. É impossível não se divertir caçando a galera. Como survivor, a sensação de se esconder a partida inteira do assassino fazendo os objetivos ou até mesmo tirar a atenção dele enquanto o pessoal conclui os geradores é impagável. "Palletar" um assassino é uma das coisas mais engraçadas.

O game vale super a pena, ainda mais quando em promoção. Não é um game pay to win, como alguns pensam, mas exige que o jogador dê uma atenção a mais se quer realmente conseguir brigar de igual com o killer, pois existem jogadores que dão um show dos dois lados.

I came back to revise my review after steam oddly enough said "hey look, you played a bit more"

10 Hours aint much to think on, but I thought I'd turn away from my rage induced review and genuinely give critique.


Its alright. Thats the whole baseline of this review. 

Things could be better if the Devs focused on whats currently wrong with the games atmosphere and competitive circles - things could be better if certain perks were nerfed, and useless perks were given a new facelift.

I think the game is worth the money spent, and the killers in the game are an absolute joy to play as when you have a good match, I even respect match ups where I was beaten within a fair skill grade - eg: Im rank 11 Killer and I take on Rank 8 Survivors.

It really killed me when I saw that I was taking on Rank 1 survivors though, because of the busted matchmaking system currently. I hope the devs work towards a better system in future.

Can I recommend it still? Like many, I wish there was a "Mixed" button. 

Its fun when the right things come together to make it fun. And I can definitely say playing Survive with your friends is a joy, especially when a killer goes out of his way to be toxic. 

Its fun when you play killer, and get into heated chases with survivors spamming flashlights and tea-bagging on you, thinking that soon enough you will hook them for their toxic nature. 

Its not fun when people after the match get toxic - its a game guys, let me play it, dont tell me I'm a trash human being that steals oxygen or whatever. 

Thanks for reading.
